other_title: Dr Slump et la petite Arale (French)
Dr. Slump: Las Travesuras de Arale (Spanish)
Dr.スランプ アラレちゃん (Japanese)
plot: Dr Slump creates a little android girl, Arale, very stong, happy and totally common senseless. They live in Penguin Village where the strangest things happen (i.e. the dawn is announced by a little pig wearing a basquee).
opening_theme: "Waiwai World" by Ado Mizumori and Koorogi '73
ending_theme: "Ara Ara Arale-chan" by Ado Mizumori and Koorogi '73
insert_song: "Pa Pa Perma no Uta" (パパパーマのうた) by Kazuko Sugiyama (eps 8,13,20)
